abstract_summ: First, COVID‐19 may have an impact on food processing economic activities because of supply and demand shocks.In this paper I explore several issues related to how the COVID‐19 pandemic might impact consumer demand for food.In this paper, I explore several issues related to how the COVID‐19 pandemic might impact consumer demand for food.My own thinking leads me to conclude that demand‐side factors will account for most of the changes we see in retail food market.My own thinking leads me to conclude that demand‐side factors will account for most of the changes we see in retail food market.
